sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    article.card
        header.card__header(:style="{backgroundImage: 'url(' + headerBg + ')'}" :class="[headerBg ? 'card__header--full' : '']")
            router-link(to="/").card__hash Selection
            .card__title Watch and learn
        .card__body
            .card__choose
                .card__img
                    img(src="@/assets/uploads/card-picture.png")
                .card__text
                    span.card__type Educational
                    p.card__name Gecata by Movavi
                .card__link
                    <svg width="39" height="39" viewBox="0 0 53 53" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                        <circle opacity="0.4" cx="26.125" cy="26.875" r="25.125" transform="rotate(-90 26.125 26.875)" stroke="#BACFE6" stroke-width="2"/>
                    </svg>
                    <svg class="progress-active" width="39" height="39" viewBox="0 0 53 53" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                        <circle class="progress-active__circle" opacity="0.4" cx="26.125" cy="26.875" r="25.125" transform="rotate(-90 26.125 26.875)" stroke="#BACFE6" stroke-width="2"/>
                    </svg>
                    <svg class="progress-arrow" width="11" height="7" viewBox="0 0 11 7" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                        <path d="M10 3.5H0M10 3.5L7.32143 6M10 3.5L7.32143 1" stroke="#35343E" stroke-width="0.75"/>
                    </svg>
            .card__choose
                .card__img
                    img(src="@/assets/uploads/card-picture.png")
                .card__text
                    span.card__type Educational
                    p.card__name Gecata by Movavi
                .card__link
                    <svg width="39" height="39" viewBox="0 0 53 53" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                        <circle opacity="0.4" cx="26.125" cy="26.875" r="25.125" transform="rotate(-90 26.125 26.875)" stroke="#BACFE6" stroke-width="2"/>
                    </svg>
                    <svg class="progress-active" width="39" height="39" viewBox="0 0 53 53" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                        <circle class="progress-active__circle" opacity="0.4" cx="26.125" cy="26.875" r="25.125" transform="rotate(-90 26.125 26.875)" stroke="#BACFE6" stroke-width="2"/>
                    </svg>
                    <svg class="progress-arrow" width="11" height="7" viewBox="0 0 11 7" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                        <path d="M10 3.5H0M10 3.5L7.32143 6M10 3.5L7.32143 1" stroke="#35343E" stroke-width="0.75"/>
                    </svg>

</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'Card',
    data: function(){
        return {}
    },
    props: {
        headerBg: {
            type: String
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
    .card {
        height: 405px;
        box-shadow: 0px 4px 30px rgba(52, 59, 76, 0.08);
        border-radius: 6px;
        display: inline-block;
        overflow: hidden;
        margin-bottom: 23px;
        // margin-right: 23px;
        width: 32.02%;

        &__header {

            &--full {
                text-align: center;
                height: 178px;
                position: relative;
                margin-bottom: 34px;

                .card__hash {
                    margin-left: 0;
                    margin-bottom: 35px;
                    color: #59DDCD;
                }

                .card__title {
                    margin-left: 0;
                    margin-bottom: 0;
                    // padding-bottom: 60px;
                    position: absolute;
                    left: 50%;
                    top: 50%;
                    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
                    font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Semibold';
                    font-size: 33px;
                    line-height: 36px;
                    color: #FFFFFF;
                }
            }
        }

        &__hash {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Regular';
            font-size: 15px;
            line-height: 22px;
            color: #357FDB;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            margin-left: 42px;
            padding-top: 22px;
            display: inline-block;
        }

        &__title {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Regular';
            font-size: 23px;
            line-height: 48px;
            color: #37393E;
            margin-bottom: 14px;
            margin-left: 42px;
        }

        &__body {
            padding: 0 42px 37px 42px;
        }

        &__choose {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: flex-start;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            padding-bottom: 18px;
            position: relative;

            &:after {
                content: '';
                position: absolute;
                bottom: 0;
                right: 0;
                width: 75%;
                height: 1px;
                background: rgba(206, 219, 231, 0.26);
            }
        }

        &__img {
            margin-right: 15px;
        }

        &__type {
            font-family: 'Roboto-Light';
            font-style: normal;
            font-weight: normal;
            font-size: 12px;
            line-height: 23px;
            color: #37393E;
            opacity: 0.43;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }

        &__name {
            font-family: 'SFProDisplay-Regular';
            font-size: 15px;
            line-height: 20px;
            color: #37393E;
        }

        &__link {
            margin-left: auto;
            position: relative;
            cursor: pointer;

            &:hover {
                .progress-active {
                    opacity: 1;

                    &__circle {
                        stroke: #7FA3CA;
                        stroke-dasharray: 200;
                        animation: progress-btn .5s ease;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
</style>
